sentences.en: ...armoured vehicles designed to withstand chemical attack.
sentences.cn: …设计来抵御化学攻击的装甲车。

sentences.en: A politician must be able to withstand public criticism.
sentences.cn: 政治家必须能经得起公众的批评.

sentences.en: A race car can withstand a great deal of punishment.
Exercise really can help you withstand stresses and strains more easily.
sentences.cn: 锻炼真的能帮助你更轻松地应对压力和紧张情绪。

sentences.en: I couldn't withstand the murderous heat.
Our army tried to withstand the enemy onslaught.
sentences.cn: 我们的部队奋力抵挡敌人的猛攻.

sentences.en: She could withstand any number of cold shoulders turned against her.
sentences.cn: 她可以经受住任何冷落她的态度和做法.

sentences.en: She couldn't withstand the lure of money and was dragged into the mire.
sentences.cn: 她经不起金钱的引诱,被拉下水了.

sentences.en: The Chancellor has withstood the criticism and held firm.
sentences.cn: 总理顶住批评，坚持立场。

sentences.en: The fabric is strong enough to withstand harsh processing.
sentences.cn: 这种织物非常结实，能经受粗加工。

sentences.en: The helmets are designed to withstand impacts equivalent to a fall from a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 头盔设计的承受力相当于从自行车上摔下的冲击力。

sentences.en: The materials used have to be able to withstand high temperatures.
sentences.cn: 所使用的材料必须能够耐高温。

sentences.en: The walls can withstand high winds.
Their arguments do not withstand the most superficial scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 他们的论据经不起一点推敲。

sentences.en: They can withstand extremes of temperature and weather without fading or cracking.
sentences.cn: 它们能够经受极端的气温和天气状况而不褪色、不破裂。

sentences.en: This fabric can withstand steam and high temperatures.
sentences.cn: 这种织物耐蒸汽和高温。

sentences.en: Unable to withstand her " once - over, " Jou - chia felt awkward and ill at ease.
sentences.cn: 柔嘉经不起她这样看一遍, 局促不安.

sentences.en: Wallcoverings and floors should be able to withstand steam and splashes.
sentences.cn: 墙面材料和地板都应该能耐热汽且防水。

trans.tran_en: to defend yourself successfully against people who attack, criticize, or oppose you
to defend yourself successfully against people who attack, criticize, or oppose you
